SA05nrat_2_u:1_0: na kiṃcit puruṣas tadvat pāṭitaḥ saha dhātubhiḥ // RATNA_02.01
SA05nrat_2_u:2_0: sarvadharmā anātmāna ity ato bhāṣitaṃ jinaiḥ /
SA05nrat_2_u:3_0: dhātuṣaṭkaṃ ca taiḥ sarvaṃ nirṇītaṃ tac ca nārthataḥ // RATNA_02.02
SA05nrat_2_u:4_0: naivam ātmā na cānātmā yāthābhūtyena labhyate /
SA05nrat_2_u:6_0: dṛṣṭaśruṭādyaṃ muninā na satyaṃ na mṛṣoditaṃ /
SA05nrat_2_u:7_0: pakṣāddhi pratipakṣaḥ syād ubhayaṃ tac ca nārthataḥ // RATNA_02.04
SA05nrat_2_u:9_0: asmād eva ca tattvena nopaity asti ca nāsti ca // RATNA_02.05
SA05nrat_2_u:10_0: yac caivaṃ sarvathā neti sarvajñas tat kathaṃ vadet /
SA05nrat_2_u:11_0: sāntam ity athavānantaṃ dvayaṃ vādvayam eva vā // RATNA_02.06
SA05nrat_2_u:12_0: asaṃkhyeyā gatā buddhās tathaiṣyanty atha sāṃpratāḥ /
SA05nrat_2_u:13_0: koṭyagraśaś ca sattvāntas tebhyas traikālyajo mataḥ // RATNA_02.07
SA05nrat_2_u:15_0: sarvajñena kathaṃ tasya pūrvānto 'vyākṛtaḥ kṛtaḥ // RATNA_02.08
SA05nrat_2_u:16_0: etat tu dharmagāmbhīryaṃ yat tad guhyaṃ pṛthagjane /
SA05nrat_2_u:18_0: māyāgajasya dṛśyeta yathā janmānta eva ca /
SA05nrat_2_u:19_0: na ca kaścit sa tattvena janmāntaś caiva vidyate // RATNA_02.10
SA05nrat_2_u:21_0: dṛśyate paramārthena na ca janmānta eva ca // RATNA_02.11
SA05nrat_2_u:22_0: yathā māyāgajo naiti kutaścid yāti [ 6b ] na kvacit /
SA05nrat_2_u:24_0: tathā māyopamo loko naiti yāti na kutracit /
SA05nrat_2_u:27_0: yo 'sti nāsty athavāpi syād anyatra vyavahārataḥ // RATNA_02.14
SA05nrat_2_u:29_0: buddhena hetor nānyasmād ayam avyākṛtaḥ kṛtaḥ // RATNA_02.15
SA05nrat_2_u:31_0: satataṃ dṛśyamānāpi yadā citte na tiṣṭhati // RATNA_02.16
SA05nrat_2_u:35_0: durjñānam atigāmbhiryāj jñātvā dharmam imaṃ janaiḥ // RATNA_02.18
SA05nrat_2_u:41_0: subhuktenāyur ārogyaṃ balaṃ saukhyāni cāśnute // RATNA_02.21
SA05nrat_2_u:43_0: samyagjñātenātra sukhaṃ bodhiṃ cāpnoty anuttarāṃ // RATNA_02.22
SA05nrat_2_u:44_0: tasmād atra pratikṣepaṃ dṛṣṭiṃ tyaktvā ca nāstikīṃ /
SA05nrat_2_u:47_0: tataḥ śubhāśubhaṃ karma tato janma śubhāśubhaṃ // RATNA_02.24
SA05nrat_2_u:51_0: sādhayan dharmaniṣṭhāni neha nāmutra sīdati // RATNA_02.26
SA05nrat_2_u:52_0: dharmāt kīrtiḥ sukhaṃ caiva neha bhīr na mumūrṣataḥ /
SA05nrat_2_u:53_0: paralokasukhaṃ sphītaṃ tasmād dharmaṃ sadā bhaja // RATNA_02.27
SA05nrat_2_u:54_0: dharma eva parā nītir dharmāl loko 'nurajyate /
SA05nrat_2_u:55_0: rañjitena hi lokena neha nāmutra vañcyate // RATNA_02.28
SA05nrat_2_u:56_0: adharmeṇa tu yā nītis tayā loko 'parajyate /
SA05nrat_2_u:57_0: lokāparañjanāc caiva neha nāmutra nandati // RATNA_02.29
SA05nrat_2_u:59_0: anarthavidyā duṣprajñair arthavidyā kathaṃ kṛtā // RATNA_02.30
SA05nrat_2_u:61_0: yena janmasahasrāṇi bahūny ātmaiva vañcyate // RATNA_02.31
SA05nrat_2_u:62_0: ripor apriyam anvicchan dosāṃs tyaktvā guṇān śraya /
SA05nrat_2_u:63_0: svahitāvāptir eva tu ripos cāpy apriyaṃ bhavet // RATNA_02.32
SA05nrat_2_u:65_0: ebhir ācara lokasya dharmasyaiva ca saṅgrahaṃ // RATNA_02.33
SA05nrat_2_u:66_0: viśvāsaṃ janayaty ekaṃ satyaṃ rājñāṃ yathā dṛḍhaṃ /
SA05nrat_2_u:67_0: tathaivābhūtam apy eṣām aviśvāsakaraṃ paraṃ // RATNA_02.34
SA05nrat_2_u:70_0: doṣān pracchādayaty ekas tyāgo rājñāṃ yathojjvalaḥ /
SA05nrat_2_u:71_0: tathā kārpaṇyam apy eṣāṃ guṇasarvasvaghātakaṃ // RATNA_02.36
SA05nrat_2_u:73_0: gauravād dīptir ājñā ca tasmād upaśamaṃ bhaja // RATNA_02.37
SA05nrat_2_u:75_0: nātisandhīyate rājā tasmāt prajñāparo bhava // RATNA_02.38
SA05nrat_2_u:77_0: dharmaś caturbhadra iva stūyate devamānuṣaiḥ // RATNA_02.39
SA05nrat_2_u:79_0: sahāsīnasya satataṃ prajñā dharmaś ca varddhate // RATNA_02.40
SA05nrat_2_u:82_0: pathyam apy apriyaṃ tasmāj jñātvā śīghraṃ samācara /
SA05nrat_2_u:83_0: pibed auṣadham apy ugram ārogyāyātmavān iva // RATNA_02.42
SA05nrat_2_u:85_0: tataḥ saṃvegavān dharmam ekāntena prayāsyase // RATNA_02.43
SA05nrat_2_u:86_0: avaśyaṃ maraṇaṃ paśyan pāpād duḥkhaṃ mṛtasya ca /

SA05nrat_2_u:88_0: kasmiṃś ced abhayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kvacit kṣaṇe /
SA05nrat_2_u:89_0: yady ekasmin samāśvāsaḥ kim ekasmin na te bhayaṃ // RATNA_02.45
